dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.context
Interface IContextChangedListener

public interface IContextChangedListener

This is the public listener interface to get notified about context changes. Listeners can be registered at ContextManager 

 ContextManager.getInstance().addContextChangedListener( this )
